game.name: Treasurer
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 음량 개별 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 수시 저장, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: You are the Treasurer. Balance between 4 factions, responding to their demands. Earn gold, send it on tasks with risks and rewards, invest in passive income, and account for value growth. Exchange gold for gems and develop meta-progression: strengthen starting resources and improve future sessions.
game.shortDescriptionEn: You are the Treasurer. Balance between 4 factions, responding to their demands. Earn gold, send it on tasks with risks and rewards, invest in passive income, and account for value growth. Exchange gold for gems and develop meta-progression: strengthen starting resources and improve future sessions.
